segment.source: Categorize devices with device group mapping in Microsoft Intune
segment.target: Categorize devices with device group mapping in Microsoft Intune

segment.source: Categorize devices with device group mapping in Microsoft Intune
segment.target: Categorize devices with device group mapping in Microsoft Intune

segment.source: Use device group mapping to group devices into categories that you define, in order to make it easier for you to manage those devices.
segment.target: Use device group mapping to group devices into categories that you define, in order to make it easier for you to manage those devices.

segment.source: Device group mapping uses the following workflow:
segment.target: Device group mapping uses the following workflow:

segment.source: You create (or use existing) device groups for each category you want to use.
segment.target: You create (or use existing) device groups for each category you want to use.

segment.source: You configure device group mapping rules that map the category you choose to the device group you created.
segment.target: You configure device group mapping rules that map the category you choose to the device group you created.

segment.source: When end users enroll their device, they must choose a category from the categories you configured.
segment.target: When end users enroll their device, they must choose a category from the categories you configured.

segment.source: After they choose, their device will be automatically added to the corresponding device group you created.
segment.target: After they choose, their device will be automatically added to the corresponding device group you created.

segment.source: You can then use these device groups when you deploy policies and apps.
segment.target: You can then use these device groups when you deploy policies and apps.

segment.source: Examples of categories might be:
segment.target: Examples of categories might be:

segment.source: Personal
segment.target: Personal

segment.source: Point of sale device
segment.target: Point of sale device

segment.source: Demonstration device
segment.target: Demonstration device

segment.source: Sales
segment.target: Sales

segment.source: Accounting
segment.target: Accounting

segment.source: Manager
segment.target: Manager

segment.source: However, you can configure any categories you want.
segment.target: However, you can configure any categories you want.

segment.source: How to configure device group mapping
segment.target: How to configure device group mapping

segment.source: For each device category you want to use, create an device group.
segment.target: For each device category you want to use, create an device group.

segment.source: For information about how to create groups, see Use groups to manage users and devices with Microsoft Intune.
segment.target: For information about how to create groups, see Use groups to manage users and devices with Microsoft Intune.

segment.source: In the Microsoft Intune administration console, click Admin.
segment.target: In the Microsoft Intune administration console, click Admin.

segment.source: In the Administration workspace, expand Mobile Device Management, and then click Device Group Mapping.
segment.target: In the Administration workspace, expand Mobile Device Management, and then click Device Group Mapping.

segment.source: On the Device Group Mapping page, enable device group mapping.
segment.target: On the Device Group Mapping page, enable device group mapping.

segment.source: Click Add to create a new mapping rule.
segment.target: Click Add to create a new mapping rule.

segment.source: In the Add device group mapping rule dialog box, enter the name of the category you want to create and then, from the drop-down list, choose the device collection you want to map this category to.
segment.target: In the Add device group mapping rule dialog box, enter the name of the category you want to create and then, from the drop-down list, choose the device collection you want to map this category to.

segment.source: Click Add when you are done.
segment.target: Click Add when you are done.

segment.source: When you have finished adding categories and groups, click Save.
segment.target: When you have finished adding categories and groups, click Save.

segment.source: Now, when users enroll their device, they will be presented with a list of the categories you configured.
segment.target: Now, when users enroll their device, they will be presented with a list of the categories you configured.

segment.source: After they choose a category and finish enrollment, their device will be added to the device group that corresponds with the category they chose.
segment.target: After they choose a category and finish enrollment, their device will be added to the device group that corresponds with the category they chose.

segment.source: See also
segment.target: See also

segment.source: Technical reference for Microsoft Intune
segment.target: Technical reference for Microsoft Intune
